resources.string: 0.9.5\nImprovements in the work of fast payments, namely, by short pressing on a fast payment, it is made immediately, by long pressing the settings dialog box appears.\nFixed some bugs
0.9.3\nMore icons added.\nFixed display errors in some windows.
0.9.2\nIcons have been added to the category.\nAdded List Of changes message, after update the application.
0.8.8.1\nAbility to select a time period in reports.
